game.name: Birds Huddled Together
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 모든 조각이 독특한 색상과 모양의 새를 나타내는 퍼즐 게임입니다. 두 가지 재미있는 퍼즐 모드, 백여 종의 새 패턴, 열 장의 아름다운 새 일러스트가 포함되어 있습니다. 얼마나 많은 종류를 알아볼 수 있는지 확인해 보세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: A puzzle game all about birds, with each piece featuring a uniquely colored and shaped bird. This game includes two fun puzzle modes, over a hundred bird patterns, and ten beautifully illustrated bird images. Come and see how many you can recognize!

reviewHighlights.text: I find this game challenging but relaxing. The music is nice too.
I really enjoyed this game! The level design looks great, the music is very soothing, and the game itself is very fun to play. I definitely recommend...
